transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hanji?
Executive: Vikrant Kumar bol raha hu sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ha boliye na sir boliye.
Executive: Ha ha aur aapne check kiya buyleads aapko aa rahi hai?
Customer: Hain?
Executive: Aapne check kiya open karke do teen time din mein?
Customer: Ha kar raha hu na kar raha hu na.
Executive: Ha to buyleads aa rahi hai na sir?
Customer: ETP ke to nahi aa rahi sir jo mera product hai na.
Executive: Dekho ha ha.
Customer: Uski to nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Nahi to dekho maine aapko dikhaya tha main kuch aapko video call pe bhi dikhaya tha theek hai and maine kuch aapko whatsapp pe bhi send kiya tha.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai to din mein sir matlab near about panch se chhe bar aap open karke theek hai bar bar dekh lo theek hai otherwise mera aapke pass number hai maine jo whatsapp kiya hai aapko theek hai mera ye wala bhi number hai ab agar aapko kabhi leads nahi aati hai theek hai aapne din mein panch chhe bar open kiya hai to aap mujhe call kar lijiyega.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Theek hai okay abhi baki mere liye aapke pass ek bar feedback jayega main aapko concert close karta hu theek hai waha pe aap satisfied doge.
Customer: Par jab tak nahi aa rahi hai to concert to hai hi na sir meri baat samjho aap.
Executive: Sir dekho wo to maine aapko dikhaya bhi tha.
Customer: Jab tak buyleads nahi aa rahi hai Vikrant ji meri baat samjhiye to concert to waisa ka waisa hai.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Kholne ke liye aapne bola hai to main do teen bar khol hi raha hu din mein.
Executive: Sir dekho bar bar aap check karne matra se to kuch hoga nahi sir lead aayegi tabhi hamara success hoga jo humne socha hai wo.
Executive: Sir dekho jab tak aap usko na din mein panch chhe bar open karke dekhoge nahi na.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai sir main karta hu aayegi to main aapko bol dunga theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai ye dekho kyuki dekho sir aapne aapke
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving buyleads for his product.

Resolution:

- Executive suggested opening the app 5-6 times daily.
- Executive provided his WhatsApp and contact number.

Next Steps: 

- Customer will inform the executive if buyleads come.

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, product, whatsapp, open
